card.title: The Perfect Setting
card.paragraph1: Imagine celebrating love in a place that seems straight out of a fairy tale. Surrounded by lush nature and a landscaping project that enchants in every detail, Beyond the Dream is the perfect setting for weddings that seek to combine elegance, comfort and emotion.
card.paragraph2: With modern architecture, sophisticated design and impeccable structure, the space offers everything you need to live an unforgettable day. Every corner was designed to harmonize with the natural landscape, creating a welcoming, romantic and breathtaking atmosphere.
card.paragraph3: Located at the foot of the Atlantic Forest, in Guaratiba, Beyond the Dream provides a unique experience, where luxury and tranquility meet. It is the ideal place for those who want an outdoor wedding, with the charm and refinement of a grand event.
card.paragraph4: And the best part: having your wedding at Beyond the Dream is totally possible. Leco Biagioni's office has the expertise and care needed to transform this stunning setting into the stage for your big day â€” with impeccable and meaningful production.
